sentences.en: " To kill an infidel is not murder. It is the path to heaven. "
sentences.cn: 杀异教徒,不是谋杀, 是上天堂之道.

sentences.en: Bow before your god, infidel. I am the Master here.
sentences.cn: 你必须向我下跪, 异教徒. 因为我是这里的主人.

sentences.en: He had some letters, and was ingenious, but he was an infidel.
sentences.cn: 他有一些学问, 且很有见地, 对宗教却不屑一顾.

sentences.en: He promised to continue the fight against infidel forces.
sentences.cn: 他许诺继续对抗异教势力。

sentences.en: He's a subversive infidel rebellious alike against his God and his king.
sentences.cn: 他是反叛上帝又反叛君主的专搞颠覆的异教徒.

sentences.en: Stay away from my lands infidel, stay away.
sentences.cn: 离开我的土地,你这个异教徒, 离开.

sentences.en: To kill an infidel, the pope has said, is not murder.
sentences.cn: 杀异教徒, 主教说过, 不算谋杀. 这是通往天国的路.

sentences.en: You have not seen the last of me, infidel.
sentences.cn: 你还没见到我的最后一招, 异教徒.

words.tran_cn: 异教徒的；无宗教信仰的

trans.tran_cn: 不信宗教的, 异端的
